title.narrative: Procurement Civil Society Systems Ukraine Moldova
Upphandling Civil Society Systems Ukraina Moldavien

description.narrative: Effektivitetsrevision av kärnstödsorganisationer. Upphandlat stöd kommer bistå ambassaden att fatta beslut samt ge brett organisatoriskt stöd till organisationerna.
Efficiency audit of organizations receiving core support. The procured support will assist the Embassy to make decisions and provide broad organizational support to the organizations.

Nordic Consulting Group (NCG) was contracted by Sida in March 2017 to support Media and Civil Society Organisations (CSOs) in Ukraine and Moldova in improving organisational effectiveness, through a support package to enhance capacity in partner CSOs. Swedish development in relation to CSO cooperation is unique, since more than 40% of Swedish development aid (2015) was channelled through CSOs. Support to CSOs is considered a goal in itself since a pluralistic and independent civil society is key to democratic development but also as a means to strengthening democracy and a greater respect for human rights in Ukraine and Moldova. Sida’s pre-core and core support to CSOs emphasises strengthening their overall capacity to develop strategic plans, implement these and achieve measurable results. As opposed to most donors in the two countries, Sida prefers to provide core funding for CSOs rather than financing specific projects and activities. This allows the organisations to develop their capacity and focus on achieving strategic goals rather than chasing project funding with the potential risk of compromising objectives in search of means. The overall objective of the consultancy support was to conduct efficiency audits, provide on-going support for CSOs in Sida’s priority areas: gender, integrity, anti-corruption and human rights based approach (HRBA) and other assessments as well as implementing a training programme with an emphasis on Sida’s priority areas: results-based management, gender equality, HRBA, integrity mechanisms and anti-corruption. A total of ten CSOs in Moldova and ten in Ukraine have been targeted during this assignment.

tag.narrative: 16.b - Promote and enforce non-discriminatory laws and policies for sustainable development.
16.b - Verka för och genomdriva icke-diskriminerande lagstiftning och politik för en hållbar utveckling.
